summary: Adds a re-textured version of the vanilla elven armor. Standalone and replacer versions available.
descriptionHtml:
I will be adding the rest of the elven weapons eventually; so far, only the sword, greatsword and bow are finished.  If you would like to request one of the weapons be added before the others, feel free to message me.

I never liked the blingy, gold elven armor in the game, so I decided to edit the texture and add my own version of the way I thought it should look.

The Standalone version won\'t replace the vanilla elven armor for those of you who actually like it.  The Elven Replacer version will.

If you have the Standalone version, everything is craft-able at a forge under \'MISC\' (\'Elven\' if you have Version 2).  I don\'t know how to make it spawn in chests or so that npc\'s in the game will randomly have it, so if someone who knows more than I do will be so kind as to instruct me, I will be happy to make that happen.

If you have the Replacer version, all items can be acquired the same way you would normally acquire anything Elven.


Installation

Standalone Version: Just unzip contents to your Skyrim \'Data\' folder, merge/replace if prompted, and activate the .esp

Replacer Version: Simply place the \'textures\' folder in your Skyrim \'Data\' folder and merge/replace if prompted.  (This will replace the vanilla Elven textures and/or any other Elven texture replacement mods that you might have installed.)

Thanks everyone, and I hope you like my mod!  Please endorse if you do!
author: Ludimmean
